name: Warp
description: You target a creature within a moderate (20 unit) distance and warp their physical form. They must make an endurance check of 10 or take 12 aetheric damage and suffer a penalty die on all physique and finesse checks until the end of their next turn. If you do not roll at least 2 successes on your spell check, the target instead doubles their physique and finesse talent dice and gains a bonus die on all melee attacks until the end of their next turn.
charge: The spell becomes a 2 unit radius centered on you and deals 15 aetheric damage.
